com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.exception
Class TimeoutException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.exception.TimeoutException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@FullyTested
public class TimeoutException
extends Exception

Thrown by class Process2 when waiting for the child process to terminate exceeds the specified time limit.

Author:
Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
See Also:
Process2.waitFor(long), Process2.waitForThenCheckExitValue(long, Collection), Serialized Form

This is a convenience method for TimeoutException(long, Throwable, String, Object...) where param optCause is null.

TimeoutException

public TimeoutException(long timeoutMillis,
                        Throwable optCause,
                        String format,
                        Object... optArgArr)
Constructor. The message, as specified by parameters format and optArgArr has a suffix appended with additional details about timeout millis. The message need not specify this detail.

Example format: "Failed to wait for filter command to terminate: %s" Example optArgArr: (filter command arguments)

Parameters:
timeoutMillis -
  • number of milliseconds waited before timeout
  • Accessible via getTimeoutMillis()
optCause -
  • optional underlying cause of this exception that is passed directory to superclass constructor
  • May be null
  • Access via Throwable.getCause()
  • The placement of this argument compared to the other constructor may appear odd. This is necessary as parameters format and optArgArr form a pair, where (i) optArgArr is varargs, and (ii) both are passed directly to String.format(String, Object...).
format -
  • passed directly to String.format(String, Object...)
  • must not be null, empty, or only whitespace
optArgArr - optional list of arguments to pass directly to String.format(String, Object...)
Throws:
NullPointerException - if format is null
IllegalArgumentException -
  • if timeoutMillis is not positive
  • if format is empty or only whitespace

TimeoutException

public TimeoutException(TimeoutException other)
Copy constructor.

Throws:
NullPointerException - if other is null

TimeoutException

protected TimeoutException(long timeoutMillis,
                           Throwable optCause,
                           boolean isCopy,
                           String format,
                           Object... optArgArr)
Root constructor for copies and non-copies.

Parameters:
timeoutMillis -
optCause -
isCopy -
  • if true, this is a copy constructor call -- copy the message exactly
  • if false, this is not a copy constructor call -- append the message with additional details
format -
optArgArr -
